Name: SLA
Review Text: Great place for non meat salads and soups! Both for vegan & vegetarian! There are few of the same shops around the city and always the same quality and menu. Service is quick if not a long line ;) place is cute, clean & green. I enjoy my meal with chill out music.

Name: SLA
Review Text:
Loved everything about our visit at SLA.

The locations is cute, the salads are amazing and delicious. Also the staff was …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Delicious salads, huge portions, vegan spicy option was delicious.  Very friendly staff, English menus if needed. I wish this place was in London!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Went in there having a miserable day but came out very happy. Staff were really open and friendly (and patient) and by the time had devoured my yummy food at home, I felt like actually writing a review :) Well done guys and thanks for making my day much better!

Name: SLA
Review Text:
Great vegan restaurant good customer service good food
Good price !

Name: SLA
Review Text: We recently had a late dinner at SLA on Westerstraat. Opening hours 11am to 9pm daily. This is a neat little cafe in the Jordaan District serving up salads, vegetable bowls, smoothies and other related food and drinks for those looking for …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Super tasty and uber healthy salads. So many vegan options and very filling. I had the vegan sushi bowl and would highly recommend

Name: SLA
Review Text: Big portions, decent price, fast. Love grabbing lunch here :) Tip: download their app to collect points.

Name: SLA
Review Text: very tasty vegetarian bowls for a reasonable price

Name: SLA
Review Text: Amazing food. Avocado and hummus bowl is a must if you like both. If you're really hungry and want to eat something fresh and tasty this is the place to go

Name: SLA
Review Text: They take too many online orders which  they cannot handle (even though they are fast in making). Then you end up waiting min 30 min for a takeaway salad, while you are the first in line in person (at least you think so) . Totally absurd.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Fresh, healthy, tasty food. Lots of options to choose from + you can customise your bowl. Perfect option for vegetarians or vegans looking for a wholesome meal.

Name: SLA
Review Text: One of my favorite places in Amsterdam. Big salads with lots of variety, all for a reasonable price. The soups are also quite tasty and filling. I always bring friends who are visiting Amsterdam to SLA.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Good salads but not the best I have found around. I was a bit disappointed that my falafs were cold and the juice was not freshly pressed. The juice came from a glass bottle. …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Beautiful location, friendly staff, delicious salad. Everything you could possibly want from a healthy meal.

Name: SLA
Review Text: SLA is the best place in Amsterdam to have a HUGE bowl of veggies etc and paying 10€. Their salads are really filling and they’re defenitially not (stingy?) with their toppings. múst go!!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Great salad and soup for those who want to eat healthy while traveling. Generous size portions.

Name: SLA
Review Text: I was excited to try SLA after I read their menu, and it exceeded any possible expectation. I don't know the last time I had food so fresh and nourishing and delicious. I highly recommend the Mexican Tempeh Bowl!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Extremely well-designed place with great tea bar (one refill possible) and delicious salads including so many healthy ingredients that I can't remember getting so full with just a salad.

Name: SLA
Review Text: You know when you go into a place and part of the menu you can compose your own dish. So then there is some parts of the menu some of the options you don’t like… So you skip those but then if you ask for something to replace the skipped …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Food and atmosphere are great. The place is cozy, bright and welcoming.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Good food quick service ... Recommend to eat there.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Really bad service! Salads are soo delicious but I ordered two times and they forgot a whole salad, both times!! Also brought it the second time to the wrong address. Really disappointing.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Sla serves truly great salads, tasty and good portions, friendly priced. Often you pay too much for too little in Amsterdam: not with these guys. Friendly staff, cosy decoration. Perfect!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Love everything about this place. Fresh, delicious, healthy salads, soups and everything. Plus, they have amazing decor.

Name: SLA
Review Text:
Healthy food. The type you feel good after eating. Put everything back balance again.
A satisfying meal.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Excelent fresh and healthy food and lovely ambiance! Friendly staff!

Name: SLA
Review Text: Vegan salad bar. And not your boring tomato, cucumber iceberg salad. Hearty, filling salads of tempeh, marinated and baked vegetables, quinoa, sweet potato, brown rice, crispy chickpeas. Everything you want in a salad. Went here for lunch, …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Been ordering and going to SLA for a while, I've confirmed their food can maintain a consistent quality by trying from different locations. …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Ordered the kapsalon bowl and the sabich bowl with UberEats. Kapsalon bowl looked awful, but was really tasty. The sabich came as per request without an egg (because we're vegan) and with smoked tofu instead. That was really nice of them. …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Great Cafe and amazing food . Visited 3 different stores when in Amsterdam.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Good place for a quick, healthy bite. Lots of vegan  salads to choose from.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Food is sometimes super good, sometimes it's not really good. It should be a bit more consistent and sometimes the meals differ which is a bit weird.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Great concept but the food is not very good. Everything (including soup) is served cold (or lukewarm). Going around 11 made me wonder if everything was just left over from the day before. Cold rice in a bowl wasn't my idea of a good lunch. The girl working was very friendly and the space is super clean and chic.

Name: SLA
Review Text: I love the wide variety of products that can be used to make any personal combinations. I think it's the perfect mixture of quality, taste and healthy food. I found the staff always polite and nice, no matter the location (I have tried three different places in Amsterdam).

Name: SLA
Review Text:
Very good place to have healthy lunch or dinner. The salad was just made and tasty!
You can find plenty of salads to choose from, and also you can order your own by …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Very cool and hipster kind of place. They serve vegetarian and vegan salad bowls, soups, smoothies, juices and dessert. We had two salad bowls, a soup, a smoothie and a juice - everything tasted very delicious and fresh. Also  very nice service. Unfortunately they don't serve any coffee at this place.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Great salads and soups! Nice interior design and also very friendly service.

Name: SLA
Review Text: If you want a fresh and healthy option, this is a good one.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Tasty, fresh, re-freshing! If you tired of the deepfried things you can recharge your body here.

Name: SLA
Review Text:
Absolutely fantastic.
Great food, super nice team and beautiful interior.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Friendly staff, welcoming atmosphere, lots of interesting dishes on offer, which are assembled on the spot using freshly cooked ingredients, like thai burgers, bibimbap and salmon salad. Take away and sur place both possible. Seating …

Name: SLA
Review Text: After a day on the boat exploring canals of Amsterdam someone from the group was craving a salad, which we decided to satisfy here. Salad bowls were huge and nutritious. I had a moroccan lentil soup -- I loved that! …

Name: SLA
Review Text: We really enjoyed this place. The portion are big❤

Name: SLA
Review Text: Protein bowl is excellent. Fresh, healthy vegan ingredients and helpful staff. Great service and quality food. Highly recommend.

Review Text:
I googled ‘healthy food in Amsterdam’

Name: SLA
Review Text: Well priced with a great selection of fresh ingredients! Tea selection with free refills, complimentary lemon, cucumber or mint water. Very tasty food indeed. Would recommend to anyone going to Amsterdam. Near the Anne Frank Museum.

Name: SLA
Review Text: I ordered a soup, large, €6. I received the tiniest little cup (not even completely filled) with tasteless soup. If I would fill it with tequila, I could use this as a shot cup lol. My colleagues ordered cakes, which apparently weren’t in …

Name: SLA
Review Text: Good vegan and vegetarian restaurant, near Winkel 43. At first we went there because Winkel was crowded, but the food was really good and tasty. It's also very cheap compared to other vegan and vegetarian restaurants. You can have a dish for about 10 euros.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Exact food, even late in the evening. The vegan sushi is excellent, and I appreciate that the weight of the food is put on the menu. Very polite staff too

Name: SLA
Review Text: Delicious food - especially the raw Vegan chocolate Chia cake, but also the Hummer was great. Lovely athomsphere as well, and very friendly staff!

Name: SLA
Review Text: If you want health food this is the place to have a meal. You can do your own salads. Cool vibe.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Really fresh, tasty food that's healthy! Excellent choices available and some yummy suggestions too. Highly recommend for a quick lunch on the go or stay and enjoy the relaxing ambience inside.

Name: SLA
Review Text: Fresh food and nice set of salads, but they are a frequently running out of ingredients (which I didn't experience in other venues of the chain), and staff can be unfriendly (which I did experience in other venues of the chain).

Name: SLA
Review Text: Fantastic food and great atmosphere for a chill afternoon

Name: SLA
Review Text: Self service, average healthy food , i didn’t like it much but my friend did , basic service

Name: SLA
Review Text: I ordered the Korean bowl and it was honestly inedible. The rice was extremely undercooked, cold, the rest of the ingredients tasted like they had been out for hours. I was super disappointed with this place :(

Name: SLA
Review Text: A bit pricey ‘for a salad’ but absolutely worth it. Fresh ingredients and large portions

Review Text:

Name: SLA
Review Text: Food is amazing. Really cute spot, would give a 5 star if it wasnt for me leaving drenched. No AC whatsoever. Way too hot, couldnt enjoy my experience
